name: github-actions-generator
description: Generates a GitHub Action which creates a new PR

commands.title: Create Pull Request to Increment a Variable in a YAML configuration file

github-actions-generator.repository.description: The GitHub repository where the action will create the PR.

github-actions-generator.token.description: The GitHub token used to authenticate the action.

github-actions-generator.openAIKey.description: The Open AI Key used to request a code review.

github-actions-generator.configurationPa.description: The path to the configuration file.

github-actions-generator.configurationVa.description: The variable name within the configuration file.

github-actions-generator.pathToLocalRepo.description: The path to the local repository.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
